text: Hagi tamagra monko a'nemo'za nehazaza huta krahakraha huta havi anumzantera monko avu'ava zana agonafine trampinema huta vano nehuta agoterfa avu'ava zama nehazana Nagra ko tamage'noe. Jerusalemi kumapima nemaniza vahera nasunku huramantoe, nama'a knafi agru osu avu'avazampina manita vugahaze?
